K10D0254_H0255:108b-1: a'arya dharma ke tu dhva dza pa ri pritstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0254_H0255:108b-3: 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0254_H0255:108b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0254_H0255:108b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0254_H0255:108b-7: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed
K10D0254_H0255:108b-8: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
K10D0254_H0255:109a-0: de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba @109a *//
K10D0254_H0255:109a-1: 'dug pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0254_H0255:109a-3: byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-4: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lags /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-7: byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-8: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K10D0254_H0255:109a-10: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-11: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtang ba dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-13: dgon par brten cing 'du 'dzi spang ba dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-14: bla ma dang mkhan po'i gdams ngag yongs su stsal ba dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-15: snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-16: mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-17: ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-18: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-19: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don ma lus par sgrub pa'o //
K10D0254_H0255:109a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-21: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K10D0254_H0255:109a-22: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0254_H0255:109b-0: 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan @109b gyis zhus pa
